inn1.comm: Ooh! A high wayward bouncer that leaped over everything!
short in length outside off stump, tapped to backward point
similar delivery, this time Gautam chops it down to third man. huge customary cheers as SRT is about to take strike.
Two slips in place. Tendulkar whips the ball off his pads to pick a couple to deep square-leg region
around the off stump line, steered out to ppint
a bouncer on the middle stump line, Tendulkar hops, rides the bounce and tucks the ball quietly to the on side. he then walks to the leg side, returns, adjusts his helmet and looks around

Done in by the shortish ball that straightened just outside off. Ravi Rampaul has gone berserk. Windies said they had a plan. It wasn't a bouncer, just leaped from short of length above waist and straightened outside off, Tendulkar stabbed at it by taking the bottom hand off the handle but the ball popped up to the keeper. umpire ruled not out, tendulkar walked, though.
low dipping full delivery, eased to long-on
gets forward to defend to the off
leans forward to push it back to the bowler
picks up a run with a drive to long-off
skips down the track to work it to midwicket
moves down the track and lofts this up and over to wide midwicket boundary. Neatly done
cuts in towards  middle and leg, turned to midwicket
rears up to the off stump line, tapped down to midwicket
stays at this crease to push this one to the off for a single
short of length, again some extra bounce outside off, steered to point
stays back to run this down to third man for a single
in the zone outside off, left alone
around the off, pushed away to point
slower, fuller, around off, eased down to long-off for a single
gambhir turns this to square-leg fielder
around the off stump line, tapped back to the bowler
Top shot! It was slightly short in length but there was not much room there but Gambhir backed away and cut it hard through point
goes down the track and turns back quickly as he knows Benn will be itching to have a shy back at the striker's end. Benn glares, Gautam smiles, crowd roar.
stay back to clip this past square-leg for a single
The bouncer arrives and Gautam is in a tangle. He was in an awkward position and tries to use his bat as a face shield but the leather zips over his right shoulder.
More trouble. Another short delivery, this time in the zone outside off, Gambhir has a lame poke at it and the ball rushes past the edge.
stays back to defend this to the cover region

Edged but between lone slip and gully! It was yet another shortish delivery cutting and bouncing across Gambhir who hangs his bat away from the body. A lame push. The ball flies of the edge but goes through safe zone.
short in length around off, pushed out towards mid-off and they rush across for a quick single
leans forward to drive this down to long-on
beaten! Extra bounce as it goes outside off and Virat is beaten on the cut.
a very hesitant poke outside off and the ball rolls of the edge to slip
No hesitation this time. It was an invitation to drive - a full flighted delivery well outside off- and Virat creams it through point with a square drive
More runs as Benn errs again by pitching it too full. And some width as well. Virat leans forward and across to cream this through covers
short in length this time and Virat cuts to point where a tumbling stop is made
short in length and climbing again, Virat gets his hands high to ride the bounce and defends to the on side
runs this down to third man for a single
full in length around off stump line, pushed out to mid-off
runs down the track, gets outside leg and slams this short of length delivery hard but straight to cover. Rampaul doesn't like it!

Top shot! Crunched. It was a good short of length delivery outside off - he has been poking and prodding at those deliveries so far but this time, he hopped back, got on top of the bounce and punched it neatly through cover point. Fab timing.
in the zone outside off, cutting away from Gambhir who shoulders arms. Rampaul stops on his followthrough and has a look across. Gambhir walks down the track. Eye ball to eyeball.
starts off with an 140 kmph delivery around off, defended to cover
full in length around off stump line, worked through backward square-leg
short in length, not much bounce from Andre, clipped through backward square-leg
this one bounces and Virat gets back to work it to the on side for a single
full in length around off stump line, driven to cover
A screaming bouncer that flies over the attempted pull but Thomas too can't haul it back in
stays back to turn this to square-leg
full in length outside off stump, stabbed of the edge behind the stumps .. rolls away

Caught at third man! Gambhir goes for the dash and slap. He rushed down the track, got outside the leg and went for the cut. The ball bounced more than he thought and flew of the edge and landed into the palms of third man.
short in length around off, pushed out to the off
short in length on the stumps, clipped past square-leg
full in length around off, worked across the line to short midwicket
Its a bouncer and Yuvraj is squared up as he hops back and manages to jab it to point.
length delivery angling across Yuvraj who guides it to backward point
full in length this time, Yuvraj was on the back foot, rather than coming forward to this and pushes it to the on side. Good fun this. Andre has already made Yuvraj think about the short ball
in the zone outside off, full in length, left alone
Goes for the bouncer and Yuvraj  jumps up to push this to the on side

Nice teasing good-length delivery in the corridor left alone. Andre will learn that he can lure Yuvraj with two lengths outside off. Either full or from short of length and cutting away. He normally lets the good-length deliveries alone if he is in the mood. Fuller, he gets tempted. Short of length and cutting away, he gets squared up
short in length on the middle, clipped past square-leg
Almost a wicket! The bouncer again and Yuvraj goes for the pull. Too late. The ball flies past the edge. Rampaul turns and smiles as he walks past the umpire.
Whack! this one doesn''t climb as high as the other ones. It was around waist-high and Yuvraj pulls it through wide midwicket.
full in length and outside the off stump line, left alone
Short of length and some width outside off, Yuvraj goes for the cut but the ball flashes past the bat
stays back to punch this good-length delivery to cover
full in length and on the middle, clipped past square-leg
Lovely cover drive. Fab timing. It was the full delivery outside off and Yuvraj creamed it through covers.
stays back to work this to deep square-leg fielder
tries the bouncer and Virat goes down under
bounces between chest and waist from short of length and Virat tucks it behind square-leg

Dropped by Sammy at backward point! It was the short-pitched delivery cutting across Yuvraj who hops, gets squared-up and stabs it away from the body. the ball flies to left of Sammy who lunges out but can't hold on. He is down on the turf and looks pretty disappointed. Sammy should have taken that. It wasn't traveling too quickly.
full delivery, on driven to mid-on
full again, flicked away for a single
on the pads this time, clipped away for couple of runs
full in length just outside off stump, guided to backward point
short in length around off, punched back down the track and Sammy stretches his right hand out to make a half-stop

Dropped by "Sammy again. It was a full delivery around off stump and Yuvraj seemed to decide late to try whipping it across the line. he gets a leading edge and it flies over Sammy who jumps and stretches his right hand out but can't pouch it. Sammy just got his finger tips on the previous chance
fullish, on the pads, rolls behind square-leg for a leg bye
tucked close on the leg side for a quick sinlge
short in length on the middle, clipped past square-leg for a single
gets forward to defend but pushes outside the line and edges it to his back pad
the bouncer around off and Yuvraj jumps to push it down in front of him on the off side
width outside off, Yuvraj cuts but can't beat point
short in length, moving in to middle and leg, clipped through midwicket for two runs
full in length, gets forward to deflect this to midwicket
short in length, just outside off, Kohli presses back to tap it to the on side for a single

short in length, sits up nicely at a comfortable height and Yuvraj goes for the pull. He doesn't connect as well as he would have liked but still gets enough wood behind it to drag it through midwicket
Nice shot. No runs, though. He went back and across and punched it sweetly but straight to short extra cover
slower one, fullish, eased past the bowler
leans forward to push this to the on side
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
leg break outside off, defended on the front foot
gets back to drag-pull it to deep midwicket
stays back to tap this to the on side
Edged past slip. It was a nice flighted legbreak around off stump and Virat went for the cover drive. Fat profitable edge!
short in length around off, punched hard but Edwards makes a diving save at short extra cover
full in length, driven to pollard at sweeper cover for a single
slower one, loopy dipping full toss, eased to long-on
fullish on the stumps, pushed out to the bowler
short in length around off, cut away to backward point
from round the stumps, width offered outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
not much turn, length ball on middle from over the wicket, Yuvraj defends
skids along without turning, Yuvraj pushes forward and defends
quicker, hurries through as Yuvraj plays back and he is forced into hurrying the bat down and play it to the leg side
slower and loopier outside off, Yuvraj opens the face and guides to point for one
flighted on middle and leg, this time there is some turn as Kohli reaches out to play into the off side. Slightly airy but safely towards cover
Kohli steals a quick single, dabbing in front of point for one
length ball angling in amiable fashion into the pads, and Kohli clips square for one
short of a length and angling across, cut away for a single through point
this one came in a touch from outside off, at 126 kph, no worries for Kohli who forces it to mid on
short of a length on off stump, Kohli looks to drop it to the off side for a single, but Sammy is quickly onto it.
fuller length offcutter, Kohli gets the front pad across to play the flick through square leg for one
confident drive from Yuvraj who seems to be settling down now, played to long on for a single
fullish ball on the pads, Yuvraj tries to flick drive and gets a single through midwicket
quicker one, Kohli plays back to it but manages to bring the bat down on time
another flat and quick delivery on leg stump, Kohli forces it back to the bowler
Kohli again punches from the back foot and gets a single to long on
lovely wrong 'un, foxes Yuvraj as it slides along with the angle instead of breaking in, and Yuvraj misses the flowing drive.
holds the length back, Yuvraj punches it straight back at the bowler
length ball outside off, Kohli drives to mid off as he comes half forward
shorter outside off, Kohli tries to dab fine but can't beat point
this time he strays onto Kohli's pad for an easy single as he clips through square leg

Yuvaj has hit one into the Marina beach. Almost. Absolute whooper of a shot. Length ball from Sammy, no pace, no movement, angling across amiably, Yuvraj just walks into it and tees off over long on. Huge.
slower ball, smartly done by Sammy and Yuvraj has to back out of the shot as he looks to pull, then flick and finally defends a short ball that comes on slowly
and a bouncer like he means it to the end the over. Yuvraj plays an ungainly mosquito-swat and misses
on Kohli's pads, he tickles it through square leg for one
slow and full on off stump, Yuvraj tries to work it with the wrists, but can't beat midwicket
fuller and flatter on the pads, Yuvraj works it to square leg
Yuvraj is beginning to flex those muscles now. Fullish ball on the stumps, Yuvraj negates the turn by propping the front foot across and then thuds the ball away with a comprehensive sweep shot.
flatter from Bishoo, Yuvraj was expecting it, and pushes to mid on for one
Kohli tries to steer a single to point but plays it too softly for runs
short of a length and angling across Yuvraj, with a touch of extra bounce. Yuvraj angles it away to third man for one
legcutter of sorts delivered at 116 kph from wide of the crease, and Kohli defends carefully from the crease
back of a length on off stump, Kohli dabs to Bishoo at point and makes an easy single by the time the direct hit comes in.
slow again, Yuvraj is early into the firm push and plays uppishly into the off side for one
Kohli plays another single, punching into the gap at mid on for a single.
whoa, again Pollard extracts bounce out of no where. Landed on a length and angling across Yuvraj who does well to not nick it. Thomas, standing up, does even better to collect it at shoulder height.
Kohli punches another single into the covers
full at 93 kph on leg stump, Yuvraj defends after getting forward
pristine timing from Yuvraj, advaces to the pitch and punches a full ball without much effort past Bishoo to long on for a couple.
ahemm, this slows up on Yuvraj as he looks to flick and he nearly chips straight to midwicket.
short ball, Yuvraj resists the temptation to try dumping him over midwicket and forces uppishly to long on for one more
Kohli can't get a single to end the over, as he looks for the dab to point
back of a length outside off, Yuvraj covers the bounce this time and steers through point for one

top shot from Kohli. He picked the legcutter from Pollard, and spotted the width on offer. Kohli set himself up on middle and leg, waited for the ball to come along and then opened the wrists to dab it past short third man for four.
very slow and short outside off at 110 kph, Kohli tries to pull but finds midwicket. He had to make all the pace on that shot.
length ball outside off, Kohli drops it in front of point, but can't get the single
another slower ball, chugs in at 114 kph and Kohli flicks straight to Bishoo at midwicket. The run rate is now below 5 btw.
slow again, Pollard's bowling pace is the opposite of his run-scoring pace. Kohli works it carefully back to the bowler.
don't bowl fulltosses to Yuvraj on leg stump. He will reach across and swipe you through midwicket like he doesn't rate you. Bishoo now knows this.

poor ball, flat and sliding down the leg side. Yuvraj has another 50. He could have let this go and earned a wide. Instead he brings the sledgehammer down on a comprehensive paddle sweep that runs away to fine leg. West Indies are now paying for dropping him twice.
too full, too straight, poor stuff from Bishoo. Yuvraj helps him along to fine leg for two more
lands this one on off stump, Yuvraj leans out and defends down the track
again, gets a hint of inward turn from outside off, Yuvraj defends down the track
on the pads to end the over, Yuvraj clips through square leg for one more
full delivery on off stump, Yuvraj defends into the covers
length ball wafting across from middle and leg, Yuvraj defends down the track
aha, this pitch has strarted slowing up. Pollard gets one to slow up on Yuvraj who is early into the check drive and nearly chips straight to point
hmm, slightly airy shot from Yuvraj, tries to thump a short of length ball outside off over the off side, and plays it in the air through the vacant extra cover region
slow offcutter, Yuvraj waits for it to do its thing and then steers defensively to the off side
on the pads to end the over, Yuvraj nurdles through square leg to retain strike.
and Yuvraj greets him with a boundary. Short of a length ball outside off, breaking in and cramping Yuvraj, but he has no problem forcing the cut away through backward point

oh boy, Sammy really shouldn't have dropped Yuvraj twice. Again Benn is slammed for some poor bowling, packing the leg side with fielders and landing a gentle half volley outside off, Yuvraj creams him through the covers off the front foot
lands one full and just outside off, Yuvraj looks to wallop the slog sweep and misses
slower and on a length around middle and off, Yuvraj drives him into the off side for a single
Kohli leans out to the flight on middle and leg and drives down the ground for a single
Yuvraj keeps strike, driving solidly down the ground as Benn over-pitches on off.
short of a length outside off, Yuvraj stands up and steers through point for a single

Fifty to Kohli now, lines up a slow offcutter that comes along slowly, but he shows patience, as he has for the strike in recent times. He waits for it to turn into the pads and then heaves it deliberately in the air towards midwicket. Well played.
slow offcutter, he hangs back and nudges off the hips to midwicket, but can't get the single
this time he does, working off the hips through backward square leg for a single
every now and then, Pollard gets an offcutter to grip and stop. Ashwin will love to bowl from this end. Yuvraj has to pull out of the check drive, and just defends to the off side
this one is fuller and Yuvraj cuts it fine as it angles across. Single to third man
Yuvraj is looking ominous. With a capital O. Full ball on off stump, he drills the drive down to long off without any effort for a single
attempted legcutter goes too far down the leg side. He bowled a lot of wides against England too.
angles into Kohli's pads and he on drives solidly past wide mid on for a single
full delivery at 134 kph, he is early on the flick and gets a leading edge back down the track
over-pitched outside leg this time, Yuvraj clips backward of square for one
straight and angling into Kohli's pads, he quietly flicks through midwicket for a single
wide outside off, Yuvraj swipes at it without moving the feet and doesn't get bat on it.
touch of reverse into the pads, Kohli flicks with the angle to square leg for a single
back of a length on Yuvraj's pads, he's timing them very well now. Dainty flick from the crease to square leg. A fitter Yuvraj would have got two for it.
short of a length outside off, Kohli plays from the crease into the off side
again, a slight hint of inward movement. No problems for Kohli, he flicks through midwicket for a single
short ball on the hips, Yuvraj hops back and works it to square leg for one more
he is sure looking for the yorkers. 141 kph and angling into the pads, Kohli whips past midwicket for single
Russell's wide problem continues. Slips too far down the leg side
short ball, sits up and waits for Kohli who pulls away to deep midwicket for one.
130.7 kph, short ball on off stump holds its line, and Yuvraj is early into a flick and misses it.
on the pads, Yuvraj stays on the crease and languidly flicks to deep midwicket for a couple
slow bouncer, comes along slowly and Yuvraj plays a guided pull. Strange shot for one. He is again in some strife after taking the single.
over-pitched and angling into the pads, Kohli helps it along backward of square leg for a single
Yuvraj is toying with the attack at the moment. Short of a length ball, no room outside off, he makes his own pace as he powers it into the covers for a couple.
Rampaul is looking for reverse. Full and outside off, Kohli looks to steer and gets an edge to the leg side

Rampaul does it again. Will this 'reverse' the momentum? Top bowling from Rampaul, gets it to nip in sharply from a length outside off. Kohli plonks the front foot across plays a swat-swipe across the line, rivalled in ugliness only by the shot Michael Clarke played yesterday. The ball sneaks past and upsets the furniture. It is one of Kohli's main scoring shots, but at times he doesn't pull it off that well.
full and reversing in to the middle, on driven to long-on
a bouncer on the leg stump line, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and fends this to short fine-leg region
gets back to push it quietly to the off side
eases this through to long-on and Ian Bishop wants that man inside the circle for the new batsman. he says in agony: "Easy single .. Whyyyyyy?"
full in length on the off and Dhoni prefers to go back to push it covers where Sammy makes a complete mess of a regulation stop.
turns this past square-leg for a single
the bouncer on the off stump line, Dhoni thinks about the pull but kills the thought
short in length, forced away to sweeper cover
overpitched delivery, driven to long-on
fullish delivery around off, driven to mid-off
short in length around off, tucked to midwicket
Crunchy cut. It wasn't all that short, it wasn't all that far away from the off stump but Yuvraj leaned back and cut it through backward point. Supah
around the off stump, full in length, punched through to sweeper cover
full in length around off, tapped close on the off side and they rush across
shortish delivery around off, Yuvraj pulls aerially but it falls short of long-on. Pollard and Yuvraj have a chat and a laugh
gets back and across to shove this through to deep cover
presses back to force this one to deep cover
slider outside off, goes away with the angle, skids on, pushed out to the off
skids on towards middle from short of length, punched out to long-on
slower, turns from the leg and middle line, Dhoni goes back to defend
lands on the same spot but this one goes on with the arm to the leg and middle line, tucked to square-leg
skids on outside off, punched out to deep cover.
the slow bouncer outside leg, Yuvraj went for the pull but was beaten by the lack of pace and connected with the toe end of the bat. It lands safely in short mid-on region
around off stump line, punched through the off for a single
full delivery but Dhoni stays back and can only push it back down the track in the end
short in length, around off, punched out to extra cover
extra bounce on this and Dhoni adjusts, jumps and stabs it to the off
short in length outside off and Dhoni forces it to right of sweeper cover where Sars makes  a diving stop
on the middle stump line, pushed out to mid-on
works this wide of midwicket for a single
short in length outside off, cut away of the back foot
gets back to turn this past square-leg
turns away from the off stump, cut to sweeper cover
sprays this to the leg side and Yuvraj goes down on his knee and laps it around the corner in some style
What a thump. he skipped down the track and swivelled to crash it to the midwicket boundary. Not attractive but effective. It was like he shoved that to the boundary
slower, guided to point region for a single
a good-length delivery on the leg and middle, taps to the leg side, wants a single but Dhoni says no. Pollard had moved very quickly to the ball
just outside the off stump, it seemed to have stopped a touch on yuvraj or he gave that impression as he jabbed it out to cover
slower one, loopy full delivery, pushed out to the off
slower cutter on the middle, tapped back to the bowler
on the pads, turned to short fine-leg region for a single
gets back to ease this to right of Yuvraj
on the middle and leg, skidding on and Dhoni defends
short in length, skids outside off, cut away hard but straight to sweeper cover
punches this to long-on to move to 99
in the zone outside off, Yuvraj goes for the cut and is beaten. Pollard appeals, Thomas doesn't.
gets forward to drive to extra cover
100 up for Yuvraj who punches it to long-off. The helmet is off and the bat is held aloft. Loud cheers, as you would expect. Dhoni and Yuvraj get together for a chat.
from wide of the crease, squirted to right of short third man where Benn doesn't stop it cleanly.. Pollard isn't amused
goes for the yorker, ends up as a dipping full toss, dragged down to long-on.
on the off stump line, tapped to point
backs away to mishit it back to the bowler
around that off, cut away to sweeper cover.
on the pads, dragged to left of short fine-leg region where a neat save is made by Ravi

Lovely leg break from Bishoo! Supah delivery.  It was flighted on a length on the middle and leg, Dhoni went down the track but was beaten in the flight and went on to complete that big lofted hit. No luck. The ball dipped, turned and bounced over the stumps. Thomas collected it and quietly removed the bails. The stumper is stumped.
leans forward to defend to the off
fuller, on the stumps, eased to long-on for a single
gets across to push this to extra cover
just outside off stump, steered through point for couple of runs
from wide of the crease, cutting across Raina who is beaten, trying to run it to third man
just outside the leg stump line, moves past the prod and it has been given as byes. It seemed to have clipped the thumb of the keeper, who is now down on the ground in pain
full and outside off, square driven to point
on the pads, tucked to short fine-leg region for a single
Massive blow! It was a short delivery that sat up nicely and winked at Yuvraj who crash-pulled it high over midwicket
pushes this to the off for a single
short in length around off, punched out to long-off
full in length, driven to long-on

It could have been a wide- full and down the leg side- but raina, who had shuffled outside leg, reached out further down leg as  he went down on his knee and swept it to right of short fine-leg where Ravi Rampaul pouched a sharp catch.
why not try another wide down the leg side but Yusuf doesn't chase this
full in length on the middle stump line, pushed out to the on side
around the off stump line , pushed out to cover
at the rib cage, Yusuf tucks it behind square-leg for a single.They think about the single. Thomas screams for the throw. The fielder throws it to the non-striker's end
Thomas shuffles to the leg side, takes it and whips off the bails. Smart work
full pitched outside off stump, driven to left of sweeper cover where Darren Bravo makes a sliding stop
fullish delivery outside off, square driven for a single
short in length outside off, cut down to third man

Pollard is ecstatic. What celebrations. Yuvraj had tried to hit this on the up but hit it softly back to Pollard who rushes to midwicket region, stops, and screams in joy! Fine knock from Yuvraj who got a ton after 35 innings.
banged in short just outside off, Yusuf seemed to be waiting for it, he archs back to cut/steer it through vacant slips
yorker on the middle, dug out to midwicket for a single
another yorker attempted, short of blockhole, pushed to long-on

he went back and across, opened his stance, as if he was expecting a shortish delivery that he can pull to the on side; it wasn't a short ball, it was a back of length delivery cutting in, he jabbed it to point
This time he gets that shortish delivery and with that opened stance he drag-pulls it to right of Pollard at long-on
full in length, moving in to middle, and Harbhajan defends to the off
full in length around off, Pathan is well back inside the crease, tries to punch it on the up but edges it to short fine-leg region
full in length around off, Harbhajan tries to lift it towards long-on. The inside edge takes it to fine-leg region
length delivery and Yusuf goes through the line on the up and gets it over extra cover. he didn't quite connect well
Clatter! Ravi Rampaul screams, "Wow!" A yorker that reverses in to the middle and off line. Yusuf goes for the big swing. And misses. Clatter!
Run out of Ashwin missed. It was pushed to mid-off where Sammy stops and fires with Ashwin miles out
lovely delivery! It cuts in to the middle stump line, goes through the bat and pad gap and bounces over middle stump
Lucky inside edge! It was a good-length delivery, Ashwin tried to dab it to third man and it goes to the left of the keeper
backs away and times this square drive well but Bishoo makes a nice save at point
stays back to flat bat this to long-on
short and lifting on the middle, jabbed to midwicket for a single

Pollard has taken a beauty but has dislocated his fingerOr so it appears. Oh ouch... what pain that must be.. He rushed forward from long-on and dived to take a very very fine catch. He immediately got up, looked to the dressing room and waved for the physio. That little finger looked really crooked. He has done it in. Oh dear. He now walks off the field
fullish delivery just outside off, steered behind point for a single
really full delivery on the middle, dug out to midwicket.
another full delivery, pushed through the on side
moves outside leg and runs it to short third man for a single
slammed! Zaheer clears his front foot and thumps it through left of mid-off
Five-for for Rampaul! His best ODI returns. Ever. Fab show. He is all smiles. It was the yorker again, Zaheer had shuffled to the off and looked to swing it to the on side. timber!
yorker outside off, pushed out to backward point
India don't play 50 overs. Again. He backed away,  tried to open the bat-face and steer it to third man - that's the only  shot he plays - and got an inside edge.

inn2.comm: not much turn with the new ball, slides onto the pad, tucked to Sachin at short fine leg. The crowd yells.
on the pads again, worked squarer to square leg. No yell this time.
once again, played to the man at square leg quietly.
Smith is away, flicking in front of square for a single. No turn yet for Ashwin, the ball is skidding along.
length ball on off stump, defended carefully down the track.
one of India's better first overs in this World Cup against a top team. Edwards defends from the pads to midwicket
wide to begin, slips one close to the body but down the leg side
very short, Smith looks to flay the cut away, but finds Kohli at point.
back of a length on the pads, worked quietly to the leg side for a single as mid on moves across slowly
Edwards has a run in international cricket. Drives an over-pitched ball on off stump to Tendulkar at mid off for one
Zaheer goes through Smith with a 138 kph delivery, full length and holding its line. Big booming drive without feet and he misses. Zaheer likes bowling at men named Smith ...
poor delivery, and Smith cashes in. 134 kph, wide and short from Zaheer, that's what Smith plays for. He sets his base and cracks a cut backward of point.
better line, on middle and off, Smith stays in the crease and plays it back down the track
back of a length on middle and off, coming in with the angle and defended carefully to the leg side
touch of drift and turn from outside off, fuller length too. Edwards leans out to defend
not the best piece of fielding at cover. Fine shot from Edwards though, pressing the front foot across to a half volley and cover driving past Chawla who dives over the ball.
slight and subtle spin in, Edwards gets half forward and pokes to the leg side for a single.
hmm, plays for the spin, but Ashwin gets it to come in with the arm and Smith inside edges the push to the off side, towards Tendulkar at short fine leg
ends with one on the pads, Smith dabs to the leg side of the pitch and they get another single. Sprightly start from West Indies.
full length ball angling in, Smith drops to Tendulkar at mid on and they take a single
short of a length to the right hander from over the wicket, Edwards stands back on the crease and plays it to the leg side
nicely played. Zaheer lands one on the pads and Edwards glances to fine leg for a single

top shot from Smith. Zaheer has got off to an unusually off-colour start here. He's bowled some wide and now he bowls one too full on the stumps. Smith shows him the maker's name and thumps it down the ground past the bowler for four.

aha, the stumps are hit and the umpire hasn't given a run out. It wasn't the strongest appeal yes, but still. Smith cuts to point and they think of a single. Kohli catches Edwards short at the bowler's end,  but Taufel doesn't give it. Or refer it. Apalling. Strange happenings in Chennai. Kohli appealed, Munaf appealed, Taufel said not out.
back of a length on off stump, played into the covers.
Edwards pushes a single down the ground
Smith turns the strike over, works in front of square for a single
Edwards works with the spin through the leg side for a single
back of a length on off stump, forced into the covers for one
holds it back on off stump and Edwards defends down the track
lovely start from round the wicket, curls in with the arm and then breaks away as Smith pokes. Just past the outside edge.
this one ends on the pads as Smith looks to flick. Leg bye stolen, Dhoni sends a horrible throw at the  bowler's end.
tossed up outside off, Edwards check-drives past the covers for a couple. Nice controlled shot.
doosra, Edwards hangs out of the crease for the offie and then pokes as the ball breaks away
Edwards goes downtown. Super shot, he jumps out of the crease, gets to the pitch of an offie and slams it straight back over the bowler's head for six over long off. Top-notch shot.
plays the last ball defensively down the ground to end the over
Smith pushes a length ball on off stump into the covers for a single

India have referred an lbw appeal turned down by umpire Davis. Seemed close in real time. It is the carrom ball, does it land on leg? Yes it does. Lands on a length and goes the other way. It is headed to middle and leg. All over for the debutant. Well bowled Ashwin, this is the first time umpire Davis has been over-ruled on referral. I daresay, Ashwin's carom ball - inspired by Ajantha Mendis - is actually better than the Mendis version.
full delivery coming in from off stump, Bravo defends down the track
short of a length on off stump, Bravo stays back and pushes into the covers for one
offie on leg stump, straightens into Smith who defends off the front foot
drifts onto the pads, Smith forces the whip through square leg for a single
length ball on off stump, played carefully in front of square
short but not too wide, cut away in front of point for a single.
tossed up and drifting into the pads, worked to midwicket cautiously
fired in on the pads, it is played straight to a slow moving Zaheer at short fine leg and they get a single. Daylight robbery, to get that single so easily.
tossed up on off, Smith reaches out and plays towards mid off
immense urgency in the running, Smith pokes to the leg side and they take off, Dhoni hares after the ball and attempts a run out at the striking end, but they are through.
offie straightens from off stump and Smith guides a steer towards backwards point
mid on is on his heels, allowing an easy single as Smith punches off the back foot
short of a length on off stump, Bravo punches to mid on
short enough for Bravo to cut, not short enough to really thump. He guides to Yusuf at cover
Ashwin slows this up in the air, on the pads and worked backward of square for a single.
back of a length on the stumps, Smith tries another sneaky leg side single, but this time Ashwin is onto it in a flash.
well done by Raina at a shortish point. Short ball, asking to be smashed and Bravo powers it away. Raina dives away to the left and keeps it down to a single as he parries it away
rubbish bowling. Short and wide again, Smith cuts well in front of Raina and encashes a gift voucher that had four runs written on it.
fuller, on off and Smith plays it back to the bowler
again, Harbhajan lands it in Smith's half and he reaches out to play down the track
aha, pops off the inside edge to short leg, but there's no one to take it. Extra bounce for Harbhajan.
fuller ball again to end the over, quietly played off the front foot towards mid off
grip and turn from off stump, Bravo pushes at cover and they steal another single
turns away from Smith who opens the face and steers backward of point for a single
drift onto the pads and Smith works to the leg side for a single
grip and turn from outside off, and a touch of bounce. Bravo defends carefully after adjusting for the bounce.
aha, half an appeal for lbw as Bravo plays round the pads and gets a leg bye to midwicket.
another easy single as Raina hangs back on the circle to save the boundary. Tip and run.
flat on the pads, worked with the wrists to the leg side. Short leg won't want to stand there for too long if he keeps bowling so short.
a poor ball, followed by a poorer appeal. Harbhajan's doosra slips down the leg side and Smith gets something on the pull down to fine leg. Not sure what the appeal was for.
quicker one, hurries into Smith who inside edges the defensive shot into the pad.
tossed up outside off, Smith defends as it breaks away into the off side
it's really not clear why you need a short leg if you want to bowl this short. Really poor ball, sits up nicely and Smith whacks the pull over the infield. He could have hit it anywhere really.
and he doesn't exactly redeem the over by sliding a wide down the leg side
lands one on the spot, on middle and leg, defended off the front foot
short of a length and hurrying in, forced off the back foot DEAD STRAIGHT to mid on. And they get a single.
and another one, Smith gets a leading edge as he looks to flick and it goes straight to mid off for another single.
short of a length, Bravo hangs back and guides square for a single
Lara is batting in Chennai! The swagger, the backlift, the clean strike, the follow through, the finish. Bravo leans out to a flighted offie and slams it through the line well over long off.
holds the length back, Bravo hangs in the crease and defends
poor over from Ashwin, he's dropped one short now and Bravo gets for more with an emphatic cut in front of square. India in trouble and in need of some inspiration.
ooh, this one hurries in flat and with the arm as Smith tries to cut. Very late on the shot but he gets it away into the covers
flighted on middle and leg, Bravo drives with the spin to long off for a single
tossed up on off, driven fluidly to long off for one more
slowish and flighted on off, Bravo is a little early into the shot as he drives back at the bowler
turning away from outside off, Bravo cuts past slip for a single
Smith leans out to the flight and eases Yusuf wide of mid off for another single
short again from Ashwin, Smith cuts into the covers for one more single
stops this one on Bravo who waits and forces through point. Good fielding from Yusuf running in from the deep, keeps it down to one.
breaks away from outside off, Smith whips against the spin wide of mid on for a single
big spin from Ashwin, lands this on leg and square him up as he looks to flick. Extra bounce, it hit him quite high on the pad.
hurries into the batsman from outside off as he looks to cut. Played into the off side

drifts onto the pads, Smith tickles it along towards fine leg and Munaf does his version of Humpty Dumpty as he stops with his feet. Easy two. Dhoni actually applauds that fielding effort. It's a sorry state of affairs.
loopy delivery on the stumps, Bravo plays down the ground.
ooh, another one of those armers from Yusuf, Bravo is late on the ambitious cut and gets a single
Smith drives a full ball towards mid on where Yuvraj's tumbling save doesn't save the single
flighted on middle and leg, Bravo drives back to Yusuf who dives and fields
aha, Yusuf is keeping it tight here, Bravi plays back to a quicker one and defends
again stuck amidships as he feels for the defensive shot to a Yusuf armer.
back of a length offie on off stump, cut away to cover where Yusuf fumbles
short again, Bravo cuts it square for a single to deep point
speared in full, Smith leans out to defend
back of a length on the pads, and worked square for a couple. As Dhoni keeps harping, India aren't a good fielding unit. The captain called it right. Second run given easily.
fuller on the pads, worked to the leg side and this time Dhoni runs after it himself.

suicide from Bravo. Oh boy, what have you done. Lara wouldn't approve of that at all. Short ball from Raina, Bravo could have played it anywhere he wanted to, he probably was spoilt for choice. He ended up pulling it from off stump in the air. To long on. Harbhajan takes the catch. Raina's golden arm has turned many an IPL and Champions League game. Can he do it at the World Cup?
full on leg stump, Smith gets forward and defends
short of a length on the pads, Smith forces the whip to the leg side
this time he gets it squarer and picks up a single. Sarwan to face now.
offie from over the wicket on off stump, worked with the spin to midwicket
similar ball, played squarer this time through midwicket and Sarwan is away.
looped up on off stump, Smith drives with the spin to long off for one more
poor ball from Raina, drops short and Smith will put those cuts away all day if he has to. Not a great effort from Ashwin on the ropes, Smith gets four through point.
full on leg stump, Smith plays it back towards Raina.
back of a length on middle and off, played back to the bowler
Smith gets his 50, driving with the spin to long off for a single.
oh boy, Sarwan taps with the softest of hands to the off side off the back foot and they get another single before Gambhir can come in.
full on leg stump, driven wide of mid on for a single.
just outside off stump, cut away to right of backward point where Harbhajan dives but doesn't get across in time..
leans across to squeeze it to point
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
slower, turns in to the middle and off, defended to the on side
skips down the track to on drive to long-on
leans forward to defend to the off
turns away from the off stump line, cut away hard to third man boundary. Munaf escorts it to the boundary, thinks about kicking it back but decides against it
leans forward to push it to the off for  a single
gets back to work it through backward square-leg
tossed up around off, driven to cover
fuller, on the off, driven to left of long-off and they come back for the second run
flighted outside off, pushed out to backward point
pushes this to point for a single
leans forward to defend to the off
on the pads, tapped behind square-leg for a single
full in length but SMith goes for the cut and mishits it to cover
quicker, eased down to long-on
gets back to work it to square-leg
turns away from Devon who steers to point
Loverly hit! Absolutely thumped. Devon rushed down the track and crash-landed this beyond long-on.
gets back to tap this to Virat at square-leg
rocks back to cut to AShwin at deep point
on the middle, defended on the front foot
presses back to clip this to Ashwin at deep square-leg
moves down the track to turn it to midwicket
on the middle, tapped to square-leg
turns in to the leg stump line, deflected to square-leg
turns this to point for a quick single. It has been referred to third umpire. Not out. The ball came out of Dhoni's gloves even as he swooped towards the stumps I think
gets back to push it back to the bowler
this time works it behind square-leg for a single
leans forward to drive to left of sweeper cover for two runs
on a length around off, punched out to cover
slightly short in length outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
full in length around off, driven to short extra cover where raina stops
straightens outside off, run down to third man for a single
short in length, cut to point where Yuvraj intercepts
Supah hit. It was flighted on a length, Sars eased forward and swung it high to wide midwicket boundary. He picked the gap perfectly
reaches across to square drive but edges it and it falls short of backward point
gets back to nudge it to square-leg
on the middle and off line, tapped to the off
full and just outside off, driven to right of Ash at sweeper cover
leans forward to drive to long-off
on the middle and leg, turned to backward square-leg region
full in length and outside off, driven to Ash at deep cover. 50 of the partnership. Crowd applaud.
stays back to push it to point
hurls across a bouncer, a surprised Sars topedges his pull short of Tendulkar at long leg
short and wide, Smith, who loves to cut, flays it to the backward point boundary. Fab knock so far.

in the zone outside off, comng in from short of length, Smith is beaten on the cut. Munna walks two steps ahead. Wipes the sweat off this forehead. And glares at the batsman. He is still staring at him!
turns in to the middle, worked to the on side
leans well forward and across to defend the off break. Turn and bounce there.
gets back to jab it away. He was confused whether to go forward or back and chose to retreat
flighted around off, turned to  midwicket
fuller, on the middle, Sars almost yorks himself but manages to stab it down the track. Crowd applaud
big roar as Sarwan plays out the maiden
leans forward to drive to extra cover
just outside the off stump line, squeezed out to point
in the zone outside off, short of length, Devon tries to cut and is beaten.
full in length, square driven to deep point and by the time Tendulkar comes across, they get back for the second
slower one from round the stumps and Smith is beaten, trying to run it to third man
full in length around off, driven to long-off
turns away from the off stump, cut away to sweeper cover
spins down the leg side .... Sars and Dhoni have a laugh. Don't think it hit anything. ump must have thought it brushed the thigh pad
gets forward to push it away for a quick single
he goes for yet another cut shot and bottom edges it to the ground and it bounces over dhoni
leans forward to ping long-on
Catch it was the cry but Smith's aerial drive went through unmanned mid-off and down to long-off. He was beaten in the flight and India thought it would go to straightish cover but it didn't
short in length, moves in to hit the thigh pad
full in length, drifts past the flick to hit the pad. A slower one there

Zak gets a wicket in his first over of this spell. It was yet another slower one, the knuckled-it over as Zak does these days. It was full in length, landed just outside off and moved in to hit the off. Smith was looking to drive but missed.
on the middle stump line, tapped to the on side
leans well forward to punch it back past Zaheer.
Sars takes fresh guard. yet another slower one, Sarwan pushes it behind point
turns in sharply from outside off, from over the wicket, pushed out to the off
leans forward to defend and the ball turns and bounds off the pad
gets forward to nudge it to midwicket
on the middle stump line, spins down, flicked away for a single

holes out to long-on. Bhaji takes Pollard out. Crowd clear their throats. It was a flighted delivery and Pollard went down for the big hit. But he didn't go for that big swing he does, rather just chipped it over, that pick-up shot as they say, and finds long-on
slip, silly point and short-leg watch Thomas defends to the off
on the middle stump line, Sarwan pushes it back down the track
on the middle stump line, looking for that lbw, turned through square-leg
reverses away from Thomas who is beaten, poking out at it
full in length around off stump line, defended out to the off
full in length, slower, moving away, pushed out to the off
pushed out to the point region
leans forward to drive to the on side of the pitch
leans forward to wrist the on drive to long-on
goes back to turn it to midwicket
goes back to work it to the on side and jabs it away ..
leans well forward to defend to the on side
from round the stumps, on the leg stump line, hit on the pad, trying to defend to the off
leans forward to drive to extra cover

Dhoni returns the favour. He was stumped and now he has stumped Thomas. It was a lovely delivery btw. It drifted in from round the stumps, dipped on the batsman and turned away. Thomas was lured forward - he wasn't looking for a big hit but was fatally attracted by that flight and he stretched the back foot outside the crease. Mistake. Dip, grip and turn. Dhoni does the rest.
tossed up on off, Sammy reaches across to defend
past the outside edge. Yuvraj is getting drift, grip and turn. Sammy looks to force it away and misses.
on the pads, Sammy taps to the leg side for a single
whoa, what happened there? Sarwan looked to guide a very full ball on off stump to the off side and it squeezes off the inside edge to the leg side. West Indies are nervy out there.
slips the first one onto the pads and it is whipped backward of square for a single
length ball on middle and leg, played down the track

Munaf is showing us just how bad, bad fielding can get. He somehow still manages to get a run out. That's how bad the running was. Sammy is gone. Short of a length ball on Sarwan's stumps and he works it straight to midwicket. The fielder, Raina, collects and lobs an accurate throw at Munaf as Sammy hurries halfway down before turning back. Munaf collects, but doesn't break the stumps the way you would normally expect. Instead he moves his hand away from the stumps for backlift, for want of a better word, and then brings it crashing into the stumps. Sammy's dive got him close thanks to Munaf's amateur methods, but he was still short.
a wide down the leg side.
Sarwan is getting stuck again. Back of a length on off stump, he pats into the covers tamely
over-pitched by Munaf, Sarwan drives hard but it is straight to cover
legcutter from Munaf, Sarwan adjusts and dabs off the outer half to third man
over-pitched on the pads, worked straight to midwicket.
breaks away sharply from outside off, Russell feels for it and misses
shorter, but not enough for the cut. Russell goes for the huge cut and misses.
Russel drives powerfully into the covers, and the half stop by a diving Raina keeps him down to one
they are finding the fielders with unmistakable regularity. Driven fluidly, but dead straight to cover.

they are losing the plot here are West Indies, and the crowd is getting behind India. As tame as they come. Yuvraj gets one to grip, turn and bounce as Russell goes for a cut and edges it uppishly to Yusuf at point. West Indies are muffing this despite India's consistent ineptitude through the day.
short of a length outside off, Sarwan steers to deep backward point for a single
full and over-pitched at 127 kph - that is Munaf's full-tilt. Benn flails and misses
Benn drives to long off for a single
back of a length at 124 kph, Sarwan cuts without timing straight to point
fuller delivery on off stump, Sarwan drives into the covers for single
Benn gets a short of length ball on off stump, he hangs back and defends to the off side
good start to the Powerplay for Sarwan. Tossed up from round the wicket by Harbhajan, Sarwan gets the front foot across and whams it over midwicket. Good hit.
Sarwan chips out and Harbhajan tries to slip one down the leg side, Sarwan adjusts and drops it to the off side for a single
flighted on the pads, Benn defends from the crease with a languid half stooping forward push
Gambhir is on his toes at short leg, Benn looks to flick and it pops up. No bat on that though.
aha, Benn takes one on the helmet. He goes for a sweep and top-edges onto the visor.

Benn looks to poke to the leg side. Surreal Powerplay field, with catchers on both sides. He gets it away behind square on the leg side for a single. There is a second. Benn is not even looking. Indian running from the West Indians.
back of a length on off stump, defended from the crease to the off side

Benn runs like a giraffe that is asleep. Length ball on the off stump, defended to mid off. He then trots across as if he's dancing to some very slow tune. The throw from mid off misses, and he makes his ground. Just in time.
Zaheer lands a short one well outside leg as he sees Sarwan making room. Dhoni fails to collect and they run an extra too.
yorker on the toes, Benn digs it out and it bounces over Zaheer's jump on his follow through. They get a single
slower ball at 119 kph, Sarwan drives wide of Raina at extra cover and they pinch a single as his throw misses.
Benn weaves away from a bouncer outside off.

A sight for the ages. Munaf has taken a tumbling catch. He did not have to tumble, but that's alright I guess. Slower ball from Zaheer, comes much after Benn got into his on-side chip. He ended up looping it gently to the left of mid-on. Munaf moves across, goes down on his knees as he completes the catch. West Indies have put the 'plod' in 'implode' here.
back of a length from round the wicket. Defended off the front foot.
back of a length, Bishoo still got forward and defended
sharp turn, Bishoo is left prodding away as it breaks away from him and he gets it away to slip
over-pitched and driven straight to Raina whose enthusiasm gives away an overthrow. He has a shy at the bowler's end and misses.
back of a length on off stump from over the wicket and turning in. Sarwan just blocks.
Ashwin slides one down the leg side and to rebowl this ball.
tossed up on the pads, flicked straight to deep midwicket for a single

Sarwan came in to an even game, has seen the pressure mount around him, and has now exited in a whimper. Back of a length from Zaheer, angling the slower ball across at 119 kph, Sarwan tries to stay back on the crease and manufacture a carved boundary over the off side. Ashwin, was however, placed on the cover boundary and easily ran across to pouch the uppish slap.
back of a length on off stump, Bishoo gets behind the line and defends
still can't get the single away, squeezing the steer past point but not for runs
interesting shot from the small-built Bishoo. Stands up to the bounce of a hustling short ball and politely opens the face to upper cut rather well, almost all the way to third man
fuller from Zaheer, Bishoo digs it out from the crease to the off side
yorker on the toes to end the over, Bishoo can't get it away and plays to the leg side
grips and turns from leg stump line, Rampaul prods forward and defends
on the pads, tapped to the leg side for a single
whoa, that's worth a review? No, too high. Bishoo looks to reverse sweep and misses, but is hit above the pad
fuller on middle and off, driven wide of extra cover
back of a length on middle and leg, dabbed to the leg side

India have finally beaten one of the top teams in the World Cup. West Indies go into the quarters without a single win. Straight armer from Ashwin, slips past the ugliest of leg-side heaves and crashes into the furniture. Great World Cup debut for Ashwin, one of the things that went right for India today. In the end, they have managed to pull off a rather convincing win.
